title: Add custom InkAnalysisDrawingKinds and limit the InkAnalysisDrawingKinds the analyzer expects
body: The ability to have custom InkAnalysisDrawingKinds for which you supply your own model, and the ability to restrict which kinds of InkAnalysisDrawingKinds an InkAnalyzer can recognize. The custom InkAnalysisDrawingKinds would be to allow me to recognize shapes aside from the default ones, and being able to restrict the list of drawings kinds would help me limit the types of drawings I am expecting.
